com.burstly.lib.conveniencelayer
Class BurstlyBaseAd

java.lang.Object
  com.burstly.lib.conveniencelayer.BurstlyBaseAd
Direct Known Subclasses:
BurstlyAnimatedBanner, BurstlyBanner, BurstlyInterstitial
public abstract class BurstlyBaseAd
extends Object

The BurstlyBaseAd is the base convenience layer wrapper class for all ads.

          The general type of ad unit
protected static class BurstlyBaseAd.CachingState

baseHasCachedAd

protected boolean baseHasCachedAd()
Gets whether there is a cached ad ready to be shown

Returns:
true if a cached ad is available to be shown. False otherwise.

baseIsCachingAd

protected boolean baseIsCachingAd()
Gets whether an ad is being retrieved and cached currently

Returns:
true if currently retrieving an ad to cache. False otherwise.

public String getName()
Get the name associated with this ad. This is the ad which is used to identify this ad in the logs.

Returns:
The name of this ad space

setBurstlyUserInfo

public void setBurstlyUserInfo(Map<String,String> burstlyUserInfo)
Set a map of key value pairs which are passed as parameters into third party SDKs. To access the standard Burstly User Info Key Value pairs use TargetingParameter.Key and TargetingParameter.Value

Parameters:
burstlyUserInfo - Map of key value pairs which are passed as parameters into third party SDKs.

setTargetingParameters

public void setTargetingParameters(String targetingParams)
Set a comma delimited list of key value pairs in the format key=value (i.e. key1=value1,key2=value2,...,keyN=valueN) These parameters can be used to setup custom targeting in the Burstly.com UI

Parameters:
targetingParams - String containing comma delimited list of custom targeting key value pairs

getTargetingParameters

public String getTargetingParameters()
Get the comma delimited list of custom targeting key value pairs.

Returns:
String containing comma delimited list of custom targeting key value pairs

setCustomParamsForNetwork

public void setCustomParamsForNetwork(String networkName,
                                      Map<String,?> params)
Used for set parameters for custom implementation network adapters.
NOTE: networkName should be the same as in the adapter implementation.

Parameters:
networkName - String network name
params - Map parameters set
